title: [dr-autosync] online recover time out after switching to backup cluster in sync_recover mode
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
v6.5.5

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

### What did you expect?
With the fix for https://github.com/tikv/tikv/issues/15580ï¼Œ the same error occurs again in v6.5.5.

### What did happened?
ctl output:
```
  {
    "info": "Unsafe recovery enters exit force leader stage",
    "time": "2023-09-18 17:13:57.443",
    "details": [
      "triggered by error: Exceeds timeout 2023-09-18 17:13:54.507598953 +0800 CST m=+755.533365084"
    ]
  },
  {
    "info": "Unsafe recovery failed: Exceeds timeout 2023-09-18 17:13:54.507598953 +0800 CST m=+755.533365084",
    "time": "2023-09-18 17:13:59.429",
    "details": [
      "affected meta regions: 119143",
      "affected table ids: 200, 2590, 2597, 2598, 2610, 2655, 2608, 208, 2595, 2596, 2600, 2647, 204, 2589, 2592, 2604, 2607, 2611, 281474976710655, 212, 214, 2601, 2606, 2643, 2653, 210, 2599, 2603, 2605, 2591, 2594, 2602, 2609, 2657, 281474976710654, 2593, 2612, 2645, 2649, 2651"
    ]
  }
]
```
pd log:
```
[2023/09/18 17:13:57.443 +08:00] [INFO] [unsafe_recovery_controller.go:547] ["{\"info\":\"Unsafe recovery enters exit force leader stage\",\"time\":\"2023-09-18 17:13:57.443\",\"details\":[\"triggered by error: Exceeds timeout 2023-09-18 17:13:54.507598953 +0800 CST m=+755.533365084\"]}"]
[2023/09/18 17:13:59.429 +08:00] [INFO] [unsafe_recovery_controller.go:547] ["{\"info\":\"Unsafe recovery failed: Exceeds timeout 2023-09-18 17:13:54.507598953 +0800 CST m=+755.533365084\",\"time\":\"2023-09-18 17:13:59.429\",\"details\":[\"affected meta regions: 119143\",\"affected table ids: 200, 2590, 2597, 2598, 2610, 2655, 2608, 208, 2595, 2596, 2600, 2647, 204, 2589, 2592, 2604, 2607, 2611, 281474976710655, 212, 214, 2601, 2606, 2643, 2653, 210, 2599, 2603, 2605, 2591, 2594, 2602, 2609, 2657, 281474976710654, 2593, 2612, 2645, 2649, 2651\"]}"]
```

comments_data.body:
One tikv panicked, which took some time to reboot, so it finally exceeded timeout
```
[2023/09/18 17:06:53.534 +08:00] [FATAL] [lib.rs:509] ["assertion failed: `(left == right)`
  left: `Chaos`,
 right: `Ordered`"] [backtrace="   0: tikv_util::set_panic_hook::{{closure}}
```
